metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28370 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Open redirect vulnerability in Tornado versions 6.3.1 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to redirect a user to an arbitrary web site and conduct a phishing attack by having user access a specially crafted URL.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> until salt version v3006.1, tornado source was included as vendored code.

criterions.comment: python-tornado: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
